name: 你的姐姐
description:
Your sister is gentle and generous. This game lets you find a lot of little sisters. Want to interact with your little sister? Just click the mouse!
Gameplay:
Main interface to choose good-looking little sister, after entering the game, there will be a lot of fragments, you need to use the mouse to drag them, they become a complete little sister image on the line, is a simple puzzle!
Many times happy, to play together!
